name: Solitaire (Amiga Byte)
overview: A strategy solitaire card game published by the Italian magazine, Amiga Byte as a cover disk in 1992. This is 'regular' solitaire. On the main part, you build down alternating colors, moving cards or piles of cards among the columns. If you develop an empty column, it can only be filled with a King. The Aces go into the upper left corner, and then you build up in the same suit. When you click on the deck, the next 3 cards are shown, or the deck is turned over.
